channel.title: Multi theiving script for rsc wanted
channel.description: Could need a theiving script for rsc witch can works on differnt npcs without me needing to pickcolors from all the monsters all the time aswell as it woud be good if it worked for some stalls, greatly appreciated. ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2009, 02:35:24 pm[/size][hr]i also woud like an srl witch can read the chat and set an variable as inchat or something like that where you can simply create autoresponder with something similar to this in rs2, http://www.villavu.com/repositories/srl/SRL/core/Chat.scar aswell as this to locate current xp in a skill http://www.villavu.com/repositories/srl/SRL/misc/FindXP.scar , it seems like there is alot of scripts for rs2 but not much for rsc witch i like and im not very into pascal yet im trying to learn tough, hope its not to much to ask for :|

item.title: Multi theiving script for rsc wanted
item.dc:creator: @tom99 tom99
item.description:
@tom99 wrote:

Could need a theiving script for rsc witch can works on differnt npcs without me needing to pickcolors from all the monsters all the time aswell as it woud be good if it worked for some stalls, greatly appreciated. ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2009, 02:35:24 pm[/size][hr]i also woud like an srl witch can read the chat and set an variable as inchat or something like that where you can simply create autoresponder with something similar to this in rs2, http://www.villavu.com/repositories/srl/SRL/core/Chat.scar
aswell as this to locate current xp in a skill http://www.villavu.com/repositories/srl/SRL/misc/FindXP.scar , it seems like there is alot of scripts for rs2 but not much for rsc witch i like and im not very into pascal yet im trying to learn tough, hope its not to much to ask for
